description: Featuring Stan "The Man" Longindis (eight times World Heavyweight Kickboxing Champion) "Trojan Warrior" is a comedy action film. Stan plays "Ajax" the good guy who was wronged by police when he was an undercover operative trying to infiltrate the business dealings of local gangsters. His horny cousin, Theo, is wanted by the whole of Melbourne's underworld and its up to the 'one-man army' Ajax to keep him safe. The bad guys want to prevent Theo from testifying at a trial that would put them away for a very long time. Set in Melbourne with some cameo appearances by local identities and with a rocking soundtrack, "Trojan Warrior" is full of fighting, fornicating, farting and farce. Cast includes: John Brumpton, Arthur Angel, Mark 'Jacko' Jackson, Henry Maas.
